abstract: Obama administration's year-old effort to incorporate behavioral science research into operations of government has yielded number of success stories, which inspired Pres Obama's executive order instructing agencies to experiment with similar efforts; applying behavioral science research is difficult, and has raised some concerns about whether government should be engaged in effort, although application of research paves way for new approach to government in which experimentation is key.
lead_paragraph: A year-old effort by the Obama administration is applying academic research on human behavior to the business of running the government.

headline.main: Behaviorists Show the U.S. How to Improve Government Operations
headline.print_headline: Behaviorists Show the U.S. How to Nudge

snippet: A year-old effort by the Obama administration is applying academic research on human behavior to the business of running the government.
